name: Days of Heroes: Stalingrad (Demo)
summary: Step into the shattered streets of Stalingrad in this epic single‑player VR shooter!!! Face brutal urban assaults, daring sabotage runs, fierce trench warfare, and heart‑stopping sniper duels in World War II action. Feel a rain of bullets and the thunder of artillery as every street becomes a battlefield. Command a tank in a crushing armored assault! 25 cinematic missions, two perspectives—both striving for victory. Do you have the courage to change history? Play Days of Heroes: Stalingrad now!!
